cv.content:
#About me


  • BirthYear - 2003
  • Location - Ho Chi Minh, Viet Nam
  • Email - thaolaptrinh@gmail.com
  • Phone - +84 034 005 746
  • Education - FPT Polytechnic
  • Major - Web Developer

#Languages


  • Vietnamese
  • English (Medium)

#Skills


  • HTML, CSS (Sass, TailwindCss), JavaScript (VueJS)
  • PHP (Laravel)
  • RESTful API
  • MySQL, PostgreSQL
  • Git, Github

data.question: Which command to use for complete details of a command on the shell?
To inspect the the boot process of a Linux system, which command can be used?
Which command can introduce clock delay?
How to delete all pods in Kubernetes matching the awk pattern1 or pattern2?

answers.answer_a: kubectl get nodes -n myns --no-headers=true | awk '/pattern1|pattern2/{print $1}' | xargs  kubectl delete -n myns pod
answers.answer_b: kubectl print pods  -n myns --no-headers=true | awk '/pattern1/2|pattern2/{print $1}' | xargs  kubectl delete -n myns pod
answers.answer_c: kubectl print pods  -n myns --no-headers=true | awk '/pattern1/2|pattern2/{print $1}' | xargs  kubectl remove -n myns pod
answers.answer_d: kubectl get pods  -n myns --no-headers=true | awk '/pattern1|pattern2/{print $1}' | xargs  kubectl delete -n myns pod

data.question: Which command can be used to change file access permission bits?
How to change the priority of a swap file/partition to 10

answers.answer_b: We can't change the priority of swap partions

data.question: Which command can give first found difference between two file after comparing?
In Kubernetes how to create a service for a replicated Nginx, which serves on port 80 and connects to the containers on port 8000?
How to compares the current state of the cluster against the state that the cluster would be in if the manifest was applied in Kubernetes?
How can you display the top 10 number of lines of a file?
